sentences.en: A pigeon probably has his Huff Duff in that incrustation above his beak.
sentences.cn: 鸽子也有它的无线电高频测向仪,也许就是它喙上部的那个硬包吧.

sentences.en: Are you tired of sitting here on your duff?
sentences.cn: 你老坐在这儿不累 吗 ?

sentences.en: Duff called me in the course of our conversation.
sentences.cn: 在我们谈话时,达夫打电话给我.

sentences.en: Duff can't start, Robben can't start but is on the bench.
sentences.cn: 达夫无法首发, 罗本无法首发但在替补席上.

sentences.en: Duff explained his meaning shortly but clearly.
sentences.cn: 达夫简短但清楚地解释了他的意思.

sentences.en: Duff Gillespie had once owned a Rolls - Royce.
sentences.cn: 达夫-吉赖斯皮曾拥有一辆罗斯-罗依斯高级轿车.

sentences.en: Duff is being groomed for the job of manager.
sentences.cn: 达夫正接受训练,准备当经理.

sentences.en: Duff said he would be demanding a rematch.
Duff soon mastered the skills of radio produc-tion.
sentences.cn: 达夫很快掌握了广播节目制作的技能。

sentences.en: He sold me a duff radio.
sentences.cn: 他卖给我一台不响的收音机。

sentences.en: Last season both Duff and Lennon crossed nearly 200 balls between them.
sentences.cn: 上个赛季,达夫和列农都有近200个传中.

sentences.en: Secondly, take p - nitrophenol as the raw material, studing the effect of Duff formylation reaction.
sentences.cn: 其次, 以对硝基苯酚位原料, 考察了Duff反应对于带有强吸电子基团的芳香化合物的甲酰化效果.

sentences.en: Sometimes you have to take a duff job when you need the money.
sentences.cn: 有时你需要钱，于是不得不干一份烂工作。

sentences.en: Tell your governor that Blathers and Duff is here , will you?
sentences.cn: 通知你家主人,就说勃勒瑟斯和达夫到此.

sentences.en: The singing group is under the direction of Mr. Duff.
sentences.cn: 这个歌唱组是由达夫先生领导的.

words.tran_cn: 笨蛋；不明道理的人；骗人货
水果布丁；揉好的面团；笨拙的人

phrases.tran_cn: 希拉里·达芙（美国女演员、歌手）

trans.tran_cn: 无用的；失灵的；出故障的
布丁，生面团，<俚>臀部，屁股
trans.tran_en: a thick flour pudding, often flavoured with currants, citron, etc, and boiled in a cloth bag

trans.tran_cn: 把…改头换面；虚饰以欺骗人
